DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate analgesic effect IL-6 tramadol infiltration intravenous tonsillectomy .
DOC.detailed_description: The study prospective , double-blind , randomize study 40 child age ≥ 4 ≤ 12 year undergo tonsillectomy general anesthesia . Patients allocate two group . Group 1 patient receive tramadol 2 mg / kg intravenously saline 0.9 % infiltration tonsil ; group 2 , receive tramadol 2 mg / kg infiltration intravenous saline . There evaluate : postoperative pain intensity facial scale , supplementary analgesic interleukin-6 . For statistical analysis result use parametric nonparametric test , take account nature variable . The level statistical significance set < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: child age ≥ 4 ≤ 12 year undergo tonsillectomy coagulopathy , cancer , hepatic renal alteration
